import { useSubscription, useMqttState } from 'mqtt-react-hooks'; import './App.css'; import {useState} from "react"; function App() { const [currentTemp, setCurrenTemp] = useState(16); const { connectionStatus } = useMqttState(); const temperature = useSubscription('dht11/sensor/temperature/state'); const humidity = useSubscription('dht11/sensor/humidity/state'); const changeTemp = (val) => { if (currentTemp === 16 || currentTemp === 22) return setCurrenTemp(cur => cur + val) } console.log(currentTemp) return (
{/*
*/} {temperature?.message?.message || 0}°
{temperature?.message?.message || 0}° {humidity?.message?.message || 0}%
° {connectionStatus}
changeTemp(-1)} style={{cursor : "pointer"}} className="flex flex-col h-36 w-20 items-center justify-between py-4 rounded-2xl">  
21
changeTemp(1)} style={{cursor : "pointer"}} className="flex flex-col h-36 w-20 items-center justify-between py-4 rounded-2xl">  
humidity
{humidity?.message?.message || 0}% {/**/}
); } export default App;
